item.title: Geochem modeling of Ig. Processes - Chapter 2
item.description: Introduction 2.1. Loading and Manipulating Data Exercise 2.1: Subsetting a numeric vector, vector operations Excercise 2.2: Loading files, matrix/data frame manipulations 2.2. Linking Whole-Rock Chemistry with Mineral Stoichiometry Exercise 2.3: Calculating simple indexes 2.3. Statistics Exercise 2.4: Simple statistics 2.4. Classification and Grouping - Using Factors Exercise 2.5. Using factors to deal with complex datasets I Exercise 2.6. Using factors to deal with complex datasets II Excercise 2.
